roleDescription: Use roles to group your clan members and assign permissions
defaultRole: Default permission for all clan members

createNewRole.title: Step 1 of 3
createNewRole.description: Give this role a unique name and color. You can always change this later.

setupMember.title: Step 3 of 3
setupMember.description: Assign this role to your members. Members can have more than one role.

roleDetail.confirmSaveContent: You've made changes. Do you want to save them?

notifyEveryone: Notify everyone who has permission to see this channel.

permissionDescriptions.administrator: Allows members to manage entire clan (just lower than owner permission).
permissionDescriptions.view-channel: Allows members to view public channels.
permissionDescriptions.manage-channel: Allows members to create, edit, or delete channels.
permissionDescriptions.manage-clan: Allows users to control clan settings, manage roles and channels, and oversee member activities, ensuring effective administration and a well-organized community.
permissionDescriptions.manage-thread: Allows members to create, edit, delete threads in the channel (including private threads).
permissionDescriptions.send-message: Allow members to send messages in public channels (including threads and topics within those channels).
permissionDescriptions.delete-message: Allows members to delete messages in public channels (including threads and topics within those channels).

mainRoles.useRolesToGroup: Use roles to group your clan members and assign permissions.
mainRoles.everyoneDescription: @everyone â€¢ applies to all clan members
mainRoles.membersUseColor: Members use the colour of the highest role they have on this list. Drag roles to reorder them.

roleManagement.membersUseColour: Members use the colour of the highest role they have on the roles list.
roleManagement.roleIconDescription: Upload an image under 256 KB or pick a custom emoji from this clan. We recommended at least 64x64 pixels. Members will see the icon for their highest role if they have multiple roles
